attributes.action: Remove the blog of the Prime Minister's wife from the Downing Street web page.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the inclusion of references and links to the blog of Mrs. Sarah Brown on a taxpayer funded website constitutes misuse of public funds. These references and links should be removed from the 10 Downing Street web site on the basis that she is not an elected politician nor does she hold any government or civil service office.

rejection.details: Comments about the Number 10 website should be sent to weboligarch@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
